mobileResponsivenessTip: Optimize images and media queries for faster load times on mobile devices.
loadingSpeedTip: Reduce the number of HTTP requests by optimizing images and leveraging browser caching.
seoOptimizationTip: Improve internal linking and use more varied keywords in on-page content.
userExperienceTip: Simplify navigation by reducing the number of options on the main menu.
bookingFlowTip: Improve form usability by reducing the number of required fields and making steps clearer.
tips: Ensure all images are compressed for faster load times.
Add more user reviews or testimonials to increase trust.
Make sure all forms are mobile-friendly.
